Ingredients.6: 5 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Beat eggs in a large bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy. Add oil, orange zest, and juice; mix well. Beat in sugar slowly.

Directions.3: Combine flour, baking powder, and vanilla powder in a separate bowl. Slowly add to the egg mixture, 1 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition. Beat until almost blended; mix the rest by hand.

Directions.4: Roll dough into 2 ropes; cut into 3- to 4-inch pieces. Twist 2 pieces together or roll individual ropes into circles to make round cookies.

Directions.5: Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden but cookies are not yet brown, about 10 minutes. Let cookies cool completely, at least 30 minutes.

Directions.7: Meanwhile, slowly mix lemon juice into a bowl of confectioners' sugar to make a runny icing. Line a few trays with waxed paper. Dip cooled cookies into the icing and transfer them onto the trays to harden.
